title: A polite question
body: So, recently i've been wondering if you can get banned for telling somebody that you would LIKE to kill them in real life. I didn't point the word "like" for no reason, this means that i am not wishing somebody something bad to happen, i'm also not encouraging them to suicide or being disrespectful. It's just a the same as telling your crush or agirl you like that you would LIKE to have sex with her, which doesnt mean that you wish her to get raped or that you're calling her a filthy slut :).

Edit- If you find that amusing, I think you should consider seeking real help.

Probably against the rules, but idk if it would be treated as a ZT phrase or not. Probably. Phrasing it as something you would LIKE, probably doesnt matter. If I just always insulted people by saying "I would like to call you garbage" or "i would like you to know youre r%%%%%ed" i would probably still get punished I imagine.

You can indeed get banned for that. Riot is stupid but they're nowhere near _that_ stupid.
